bidOf(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Get bid for address for particular round

cancelAllBidsAndWithdrawCollateral(uint2.notice: Cancel all bids and withdraw collateral

cancelBidAndWithdrawCollateral(uint256,u.notice: Cancel bid for current round and withdraw collateral

closeAuction(uint256).notice: Close auction and trigger a transfer to the highest bidder

highestBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Get highest outstanding bid for a particular round

lockedCollateral(uint256,address).notice: Get locked collateral from all bids
